text: If you procrastinate a lot  the issue may be the lack of self discipline not motivation  If you procrastinate constantly  you may not unmotivated  rather you may lack self discipline  I have had a serious issue with procrastination and thought that being motivated would fix it  and as schools put the fix to procrastination to motivation  why wouldn t I  but I found that being motivated didn t do anything for my procrastination  instead the blame for my procrastination lies toward the fact that I lacked self discipline  the same can be for you procrastinators out there  where I as a child  was rewarded for being smart rather than being a hard worker  I didn t have the discipline to do the work I didn t want to do  like study or read  so instead of blaming your procrastination on your motivation maybe its the fact you lack self discipline
summary: If you procrastinate a lot the issue may be the lack of self discipline not motivation. As a child I was rewarded for being smart rather than being a hard worker. I didn't have the discipline to do the work I didn t want to do.
